QuestData.Title: You Never Know Until You Scry
QuestData.Description: In order to find the spirits of our family, I will need materials to scry their location.$b$bThe naga carry magical trinkets imbued with ley energy that is better-attuned to this land than anything we have in Dalaran. If I had a few of those, I could do some real scrying.
QuestData.CompletionText: I would have brought my own spell foci if SOMEONE hadn't been rushing me...
QuestData.RewardText: Perfect. Let's get this ritual started, shall we?
